author: Jon Katz
comment: It'll do splits so you can see multiple individual times, BUT it doesn't show the cumulative time.  For instance if you are doing a workout with timed segments you'll only get each segment time, not the total :(
title: Better then stock... but not great

author: Cyrus Mistry
comment: Nice interface - big easy to press buttons for lap times.  If this showed the cumulative time and lap # on the main screen (can't find cumulative time anywhere), then this would be a 5-star app.
title: Pretty good

author: Andy Gates
comment: Keeps the screen on, which devours battery over a long session. Needs an update to follow the device's screen behavior.
title: Not bad!

author: Joey Cannon
comment: First of all, it doesn't count the last lap (when you hit stop instead of lap) as the fastest lap, even if it was the fastest. Second, I want it to show me the total time, not just the individual laps. Third, a dim screen would help save battery life. Other than that, it works.
title: Good, but missing a few features.

author: Peter Biggs
comment: Good chunky main display and vibration, but no pause and no background-running.
title: Dissapointing

author: RASPAL BHATIA
comment: Would be awesome if it had cumulative time for split timing & export times feature / history
title: Like it!

author: Derek Steelman
comment: Would be great if the lap split and total time could be reversed on the display.
title: Good but could be better

author: Nigel Steelman
comment: Perfect except the screen stays on. Ability to set screen dim timeout would be nice.
title: Needs screen off
